title: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398 - There are accessibility problems in the application. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
EB: When I launch the Help view, I expect the tab key to navigate through the elements in the view.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the Help view. 
2. Press the tab key and observe that it doesn't navigate through the elements in the view.
